> =
slowly coming around as their reserves kicked in. "Stupid insects set

d slowly to his feet as BAZOOKA tried to do much the same.

 BAZOOKA said. "Magmatron is insane with power now and

ne pushing the buttons."

an to trudge away, opposite the direction that BLACKARACHNIA took.

BLAC=
KARACHNIA had gotten away, to sneak another day.  With plenty of sensor rea=
dings over on the jamming field for later analysis, of the towers that had =
spread energon itnerference throughout the area..  They seemed to be gradua=
lly collapsing, so soon her link with TARANTALUS would reestablish itself, =
but for now she had bliss and quiet as she snuck off.
